title: The Last Of Us
info: +18 · 2023 · Action, Adventure, Drama · 60 minutes per episode
description: Set in a post-apocalyptic world, 'The Last of Us' follows Joel and Ellie as they navigate a ravaged landscape and fight for survival amidst a deadly fungal infection.

title: Breaking Bad
info: +18 · 2008–2013 · Crime, Drama, Thriller · 47 minutes per episode
description: The story of Walter White, a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer, as he descends into the criminal underworld after a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The Crown
info: +16 · 2016–present · Biography, Drama, History · 60 minutes per episode
description: A biographical drama that chronicles the reign of Queen Elizabeth II, exploring the political and personal challenges she faces during her reign over the British monarchy.

title: Stranger Things
info: +16 · 2016–present · Drama, Fantasy, Horror · 50 minutes per episode
description: A group of kids in the 1980s uncover dark government secrets and encounter strange supernatural occurrences in their small town of Hawkins, Indiana.

title: The Bear
description: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop, learning the highs and lows of both cooking and managing a restaurant.

title: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of players, who are deep in debt, participate in a series of children's games with a deadly twist for a tempting prize.
